title: Is it safe to conduct exams during covid-19? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course, this is a serious issue and need to handle carefully, because students who are giving exam may not like to give test but this will take their extra time of learning and overall the future of nation will get delayed. Just think, if we ignore the test for 1 or 2 year, so no test, no admission, no donation, fee hike on other student, no student means less teacher requirement, less student pursuing degree, 25% less graduate, job requirement decrease, overall GDP effected. so we cannot miss even one year of exams
